title: Explainer: Philipsen’s Only Hope to Dislodge Girmay’s Green Jersey Hinges on Bonus Sprints
content:
Girmay leads the Tour de France green jersey by 32 points, but mid-stage bonus sprints could give Philipsen a slim option: 'The chance of succeeding is very small.'

Read the full article at Explainer: Philipsen’s Only Hope to Dislodge Girmay’s Green Jersey Hinges on Bonus Sprints on Velo.
author: ahood
